item.title: Annie add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When we love, we always strive to become better than we are. When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Annie add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everyday God gives us a moment in which it is possible to change everything that makes us unhappy." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Annie add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When each day is the same as the next, itâ€™s because people fail to recognize the good things that happen in their lives every day that the sun rises." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Annie add a quote by Paulo Coehlo
item.description: "Don't forget that everything you deal with is only one thing and nothing else." -- Paulo Coehlo

item.title: Annie add a quote by Paulo Coehlo
item.description: "It's only those who are persistent and willing to study things deeply, who achieve the master work." -- Paulo Coehlo

item.title: Annie add a quote by Paulo Coehlo
item.description: "Your eyes show the strength of your soul." -- Paulo Coehlo

item.title: Annie add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Maybe who we are isn't so much about what we do, but rather what we're capable of when we least expect it." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Annie add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "My mother... she is beautiful, softened at the edges and tempered with a spine of steel. I want to grow old and be like her." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Annie add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Did you ever walk through a room that's packed with people, and feel so lonely you can hardly take the next step?" -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Annie add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "Things had a way of working out for the best when you let them run their course." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Annie add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "There are millions of people in the world, and the spirits will see that most of them you never have to meet. But there are one or two you are tied to, and the spirits will cross you back and forth, threading so many knots until they catch and you finally get it right." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Annie add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "I am Alice in Wonderland', Josie thought. 'Watch me fall." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Annie add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "If you want to see God laugh, make a plan." -- Jodi Picoult
